001package net.tvburger.jdl.plots;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Threads;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.UnaryEstimationFunction;
008import org.knowm.xchart.SwingWrapper;
009import org.knowm.xchart.XYChart;
010import org.knowm.xchart.XYChartBuilder;
011import org.knowm.xchart.XYSeries;
012import org.knowm.xchart.style.lines.SeriesLines;
013import org.knowm.xchart.style.markers.None;
014import org.knowm.xchart.style.markers.SeriesMarkers;
015
016public class Plot implements DataRenderer {
017
018    private final XYChart chart;
019    private SwingWrapper<XYChart> wrapper;
020
021    public Plot(String title) {
022        this.chart = createChart(title);
023    }
024
025    private static XYChart createChart(String title) {
026        return new XYChartBuilder()
027                .width(600).height(300)
028                .title(title)
029                .xAxisTitle("x")
030                .yAxisTitle("y")
031                .build();
032    }
033
034    public XYChart getChart() {
035        return chart;
036    }
037
038    public void setYRange(double min, double max) {
039        chart.getStyler().setYAxisMin(min);
040        chart.getStyler().setYAxisMax(max);
041    }
042
043    public void setSeries(String name, float[] x, float[] y) {
044        double[] xd = new double[x.length];
045        for (int i = 0; i < xd.length; i++) {
046            xd[i] = x[i];
047        }
048        double[] yd = new double[y.length];
049        for (int i = 0; i < yd.length; i++) {
050            yd[i] = y[i];
051        }
052        setSeries(name, xd, yd);
053    }
054
055    public void setSeries(String name, double[] x, double[] y) {
056        XYSeries xySeries = chart.getSeriesMap().get(name);
057        if (xySeries != null) {
058            chart.updateXYSeries(name, x, y, null);
059        } else {
060            XYSeries series = chart.addSeries(name, x, y);
061            series.setMarker(new None());
062        }
063    }
064
065    public void setPoints(String name, float[] x, float[] y) {
066        XYSeries series = chart.addSeries(name, x, y);
067        series.setMarker(SeriesMarkers.CIRCLE);
068        series.setLineStyle(SeriesLines.NONE);
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public void display() {
073        chart.getStyler().setXAxisDecimalPattern("0.##");
074        wrapper = new SwingWrapper<>(chart);
075        wrapper.setTitle(chart.getTitle());
076        chart.setTitle("");
077        wrapper.displayChart();
078        Threads.sleepSilently(1_000);
079    }
080
081    public <N extends Number> void plotTargetOutput(UnaryEstimationFunction<N> function, String name) {
082        plotTargetOutput(function, name, 100);
083    }
084
085    public <N extends Number> void plotTargetOutput(UnaryEstimationFunction<N> function, String name, int n) {
086        Pair<float[], float[]> pair = computeXY(function, n);
087        setSeries(name, pair.left(), pair.right());
088    }
089
090    public <N extends Number> Pair<float[], float[]> computeXY(UnaryEstimationFunction<N> function, int n) {
091        float min = 0.0f;
092        float max = 1.0f;
093        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = function.getCurrentNumberType();
094        N range = typeSupport.substract(typeSupport.valueOf(max), typeSupport.valueOf(min));
095        N counter = typeSupport.zero();
096        N n_min_1 = typeSupport.valueOf(n - 1);
097        float[] x = new float[n];
098        float[] y = new float[x.length];
099        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
100            N input = typeSupport.add(typeSupport.multiply(typeSupport.divide(range, n_min_1), counter), typeSupport.valueOf(min));
101            N output = function.estimateUnary(input);
102            x[i] = input.floatValue();
103            y[i] = output.floatValue();
104            counter = typeSupport.add(counter, typeSupport.one());
105        }
106        return Pair.of(x, y);
107    }
108
109    public void plotDataSet(DataSet<?> dataSet, String name) {
110        float[] x = new float[dataSet.size()];
111        float[] y = new float[x.length];
112        for (int i = 0; i < dataSet.size(); i++) {
113            x[i] = dataSet.samples().get(i).features()[0].floatValue();
114            y[i] = dataSet.samples().get(i).targetOutputs()[0].floatValue();
115        }
116        setPoints(name, x, y);
117    }
118
119    public void redraw() {
120        if (wrapper != null) {
121            wrapper.repaintChart();
122        }
123    }
124
125    public void addToSeries(String name, float[] x, float[] y) {
126        XYSeries xySeries = chart.getSeriesMap().get(name);
127        double[] xData = xySeries == null ? new double[0] : xySeries.getXData();
128        double[] yData = xySeries == null ? new double[0] : xySeries.getYData();
129        double[] xDataNew = new double[xData.length + x.length];
130        double[] yDataNew = new double[yData.length + y.length];
131        System.arraycopy(xData, 0, xDataNew, 0, xData.length);
132        System.arraycopy(yData, 0, yDataNew, 0, yData.length);
133        for (int i = 0; i < x.length; i++) {
134            xDataNew[i + xData.length] = x[i];
135        }
136        for (int i = 0; i < y.length; i++) {
137            yDataNew[i + yData.length] = y[i];
138        }
139        setSeries(name, xDataNew, yDataNew);
140    }
141}
